[bq="HJSDGCE"]Guys, I know this is a bit late but a few hours ago, I found a young kitten in the mailbox. Usually, I would just leave it alone but after a while, its mother didn't return so I took it in.

So, how do I take care of it? From the looks of it, I'd say it's a week old.[/bq]
Just in case no one sees it.

"@SidewardManatee":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ff104763687242262f0800#post_54ff104763687242262f0800
Umm, OK. I'll try to do it.
Someday.

~^Everyone's too busy to care...^~
